docs.lead_paragraph: There was a time when the rather threadbare telegram, "All quiet along the Potomac," bade fair to go down to posterity with the epigrammatic but comforting "All Right" of the suppositious DESAUTY, in sweet unison blended, a philological monument to the patience of a people.
